metadata.feature_description: Manages directories that should be included in search crawling operations

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View list of all included directories with paths

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling tab opens showing Included Directories section
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to Crawling tab. Included Directories section visible with 'Badges/' listed

steps.action: Review the Included Directories list display
steps.expected: Directory list shows folder paths with directory names
steps.actual: Directory list displays 'Badges/' with path format and trash icon for deletion

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add directory to included list using folder picker

steps.action: Click '+ Add Directory' button in Included Directories section
steps.expected: Folder picker opens for directory selection
steps.actual: Add directory panel expanded showing folder picker dropdown

steps.action: Click folder picker dropdown to expand folder tree
steps.actual: Folder tree expanded showing all available directories: Badges, Content Images, Images, Logos, Templates, Users, etc.

steps.action: Select 'Images' folder from the folder picker
steps.expected: Images folder is selected in the picker
steps.actual: Images folder selected, picker shows 'Images' as selected folder

steps.action: Click Save button to add the directory
steps.expected: Images directory added to Included Directories list
steps.actual: Directory successfully added. List now shows 'Badges/' and 'Images/' as included directories

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add already included directory and verify duplicate error

steps.action: Click '+ Add Directory' and select 'Badges' folder (already in list)
steps.expected: Error message displayed for duplicate directory
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'Directory duplicated. This directory Badges/ is already added'

steps.action: Click trash icon next to 'Images' directory
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog displayed: 'Are you sure you want to delete Images?' with Yes/No buttons
Directory successfully removed. Included Directories list now shows only 'Badges/'

observations: Code shows conflict validation exists for directories that are both included and excluded, but this was not tested as it is beyond STANDARD testing scope for Medium priority
Folder picker uses dnn-folder-picker component with serviceFramework for folder browsing
Delete operation shows confirmation dialog before removing directory
Duplicate validation returns error message 'errorDuplicateDirectory' which is localized in UI as 'Directory duplicated. This directory [path] is already added'
